modName: Minimum Skill Requirements For Guild Quests
summary:
BETA -- Looking for BETA Testers at this stage -- 
Adds minimum requirements for the Mages Guild and Thieves Guild before the quest initiates and you are asked to join.  Will eventually add all main guilds, but I want to be sure to work out the bugs first. If you\'d like to test it out, please leave a comment to report any bugs :)
descriptionHtml:
BETA - Always back up your game saves!
--------------------------------------------------------

This is a Beta version of a requested mod by:
Morattis, StuartSmiles, Onar23
for more difficult entry into factions

Current Factions with min requirements:
Mages Guild: All schools of magic require the player to have their skills at level 30 or above
Thieves Guild: Sneak, Lockpicking, and Pickpocketing are all required to be at level 30 or above

Beta Testers!
===========
Please let me know if you encounter any bugs! I want to test this on a larger scale.

Mod Users!
==========
If you don\'t want to deal with bugs when you download this, I highly suggest you wait until I do a stable release :)
author: Cynster
